SmartMarketing on Demand

 

Most small businesses agree it would be great to;

  • Have more prospects to talk to
  • Get found by people who want to do business with you
  • See who is finding you and how they get there
  • Communicate with these people effectively
  • Successfully turn prospects into sales opportunities

Yet there are very few smaller businesses who could find, fund and manage an SEO expert, an online advertising specialist, a content writer, an email marketing campaign manager, a social media guru, an event co-ordinator and the right marketing tools to make this happen.

The good news is; you donâ€™t have to recruit an in-house marketing specialist. Instead, work with software and technology marketing experts on a flexible, affordable and low-risk programme.

Terry Forsey Consulting deliver the largest range of marketing services for smaller technology and software businesses.

Our SmartMarketing on Demand service provides:

  • A wide range of low cost & flexible marketing services for technology and software businesses without the time and resource in-house
  • Outsourced marketing activities delivered by experienced technology and software marketers
  • Low-risk marketing resources without the recruitment cost and commitment
  • Transparent pricing structures and a monthly fee to suit your budget
  • Performance reporting and recommendations

How we get started:

  • Agree what business goals you are trying to achieve
  • Recommend how best to achieve those goals
  • Agree how many resource hours each month you will need to fit with your budget.
  • Implement, manage and report on your SmartMarketing-on-Demand programme

Take a look the marketing activities we can offer as part of a SmartMarketing-on-Demand serviceâ€¦

 

We would love to tell you more about our flexible, low cost SmartMarketing-on-Demand Service. If you are interested in learning more about how we can help you grow your business, then call today on 01536 771440. We will then arrange a convenient time to have an informal chat about your business challenges and needs. Or click on the REQUEST CALL BACK button.
